config.neo4j.topic.cypher.mirea.public.cafedra: WITH event WHERE event.op = 'c' MERGE (c:Cafedra {id: event.after.id}) ON CREATE SET c.title = event.after.title, c.institute_id = event.after.institute_id ON MATCH SET c.title = event.after.title, c.institute_id = event.after.institute_id WITH c, event MATCH (i:Institute {id: c.institute_id}) MERGE (i)-[:HAS_CAFEDRA]->(c)
